title: Opulent North Island Farmhouse Retreat Overlooking the Bay of Plenty
description:
**Please Note:** The property is at full capacity and unable to be booked from April-September 2024.

Discover enchanting old-world opulence with a stay at The French Country House, encircled by the rambling hills of New Zealand’s stunning Bay of Plenty. Scenic views of the vast surrounding farmyard, filled with pheasants, turkeys and wild ducks, make this the perfect escape for those seeking a cosy yet charming stay. Fall in love with each of the boutique rooms on offer, with each one masterfully filled with antique furnishings along with modern comforts to ensure a sublime stay.

The French Country House is the perfect starting point to explore the greater Bay of Plenty and Tauranga region. Boundless windswept beaches, ancient forests, historical oddities and national treasures are within an easy drive of the property, including the thermal hotspots of Rotorua, the impressive Coromandel famed for its dramatic coastal landscapes visit the original Hobbiton movie set from The Lord of the Rings trilogy in Matamata.
